title: Linking Labor Unions with Workplace Learning: Case-Based Practical Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Accessibility-optimized learning design for office workers in smartphone-based LMS environments

learning_goals: The impact of labor unions on workplace learning programs can be explained through case analysis of the European steel industry
Three or more strategic roles of labor unions in expanding workplace learning opportunities can be presented
Case-based intervention strategies for labor unions to strengthen the learning-employment linkage can be proposed

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
